1.0.name: wordpress/quote-archive
1.0.description:
This plugin allows you to create and manage a table with with quotes of any author you like. Once you have quotes enaugh in the table, you can view them in various formatas: in a post, in a page, in the sidebar.. You can see just one random quote, or all of them.

It have two separate parts:

  1. The Management panell. It is installed as a new menu in your admin panell. There you can add, modify or view the quotes.
  2. The Options panell. There you can customize the visualization of the existing data.
